146749.<start_lip_sync n01510 _normal m00001>「救:

37759.<start_lip_sync m08700 _normal m00001>「ゴ:
<start_lip_sync m08700 _normal m00001>Gorloo. I can smell it! This guy

37760.<start_lip_sync m08700 _normal m00001>「オ:

37761.<start_lip_sync m10801 _normal m00001>「我:

37762.<start_lip_sync m10801 _normal m00001>「せ:

37763.<start_lip_sync m10801 _normal m00001>「貴:

37764.<start_lip_sync m09502 _normal m00001>「ど:
<start_lip_sync m09502 _normal m00001>How do you like my shiny body? An

37765.<start_lip_sync m09502 _normal m00001>「知:

37766.<start_lip_sync m09502 _normal m00001>「さ:

37767.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「お:

37768.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「私:

37769.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>I have eaten many alchemists, and I

37770.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「だ:

37771.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「ク:

37772.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>Unaware of this, you have continued to

37773.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「残:

37774.<start_lip_sync m11003 _normal m00001>「ふ:
